channel.title: LackRack on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in LackRack on Inductive Bias

item.title: Shopping at Ikea
item.description: Shopping at Ikea # Some weeks ago, Thilo had a tiny little gadget not to be missed in an average geek’s appartment: A server - admittedly a little old and a bit slow, but still usable for playing around. He installed Ubuntu server on it. At the evening we got it configured to run Hadoop. Little later we found out that some friends of us probably, maybe have some usable hardware left as well - we’ll see on Monday.
